Gerard, unlikely to be an outbreak for that long, they don't last that long.  Also unlikely from the exam or ultrasound.  An allergic reaction from medicine usually results in itching all over and hives.If the symptoms are lessened after taking the medicine, that's reassuring.  Yes, Herpes comes and goes.  But doesn't give symptoms for 5 months straight.
